phrases: One more week until the final.
They averaged 20 percent on the first test.
And on the midterm, they averaged 26 percent.
At this rate, if nothing goes wrong, we will make it!
That is right, if nothing goes wrong!
He is sleeping like he is dead.
I focus too hard on studying, and before I know it, it is morning.
I am going to have you all pass everything this time.
To that end, I have prepared this.
It is a problem set that covers all the areas we can expect to come up.
If we go through this, we should have a fighting chance.
L-Let us call off our plan today.
Were you up all night working on this?
I cannot just make you guys do all the hard work.
I have to set an example.
Anyway, let us go, before people start bouncing.
My favorite actor's on the variety show airing right now!
There is a documentary on right now.
I cannot miss the special today.
It stays off during study time.
Do those two not get along?
They are like a cat and dog, I guess.
Believe it or not, she is the most sensitive of all of us.
So she butts heads a lot.
we will be in your care for the next week.
I am glad everyone is joining in now...
But now we have a new problem.
If you can get those two in a good mood, Uesugi-san,
You two seem to be doing great.
You are both, like, very studious and wholesome, and...
He sucks at giving out compliments!
What is gotten into you, Futaro?
So you did think it was a little creepy.
If you become their common enemy by being really hard on them,
They are trying the best they can.
I would not feel good scolding them for it.
I did not realize you actually have a soul.
Is that all you have managed to do so far?
Well, not like finishing these problems will be enough for you halfwits!
Oh, I am sorry, did I say halfwits?
Is it just me, or is he enjoying this?
You do not have to tell me anything.
Wait, this section's not going to be on the exam.
I would if I could, but this is too boring.
I will study in my room.
An entire set's gone to waste now.
Are not going to set an example?
You are already off to a late start.
You got to catch up with the others.
I do not have to take this from you.
You are just a tutor for hire.
So what if he made some problem sets?
Why are you getting fooled by these scraps of paper?
You showed up late today, too.
If you think you are teaching us anything like this, you are sorely mistaken.
Miku, do not worry about me.
Since when have you been on his side?
You fell right for his slick talk!
Getting all worked up over this trash!
He does not have a printer or a photocopier, you know.
This boy actually handwrote all of it.
So the least we can do is take this just as seriously as he does.
You guys are going to choose him over me.
I will just move out, then.
I have been planning on it for a while now.
Mother would be so sad if she saw us now.
And quit trying to act like her replacement all the time.
Nino, you need to think this through!
Yeah, let us talk it over.
She was the one who hit me first.
I cannot live with that domestic violence meat monster.
Oh, if I am such a pain in the ass, I will move out!
Only the next day did I hear from Miku that Itsuki and Nino had actually left home.
But I feel like this time, it is a bit different.
Ichika: Please make up Nino: No. Stop contacting me Itsuki: I have no intention of going home, either.
I am sorry for causing the rest of you to worry, but I am not coming home until Nino apologizes.
Ichika and Yotsuba tried to talk sense into them,
but they are both being stubborn.
They are acting like if they come home first, they will have lost.
They said they had some stuff to take care of.
So the two of us are going to have to find Itsuki and Nino.
Well, we are the weakest two of the group.
Have you seen anyone who looks like this?
Must be useful to be quintuplets, huh?
I have seen a face like yours at the hotel I am staying at.
How did you even get in?!
I told them I forgot my keys in my room, and they opened it for me.
Nino, what is gotten into you?
You have always been the one who cared the most about your sisters and your home.
I told you to stop talking like you know anything.
Especially when this was all your fault!
You should never have come into our lives!
This condominium is private property No Trespassing Suspicious individuals will be reported
We figured out where Nino is,
but Itsuki is nowhere to be found.
Not much we can do now.
Let us call it a night.
I am sure Itsuki is at some luxury hotel somewhere, too.
She forgot her purse at home.
I bet she is hungry, too.
Thanks for letting me use the bath first.
Well, Itsuki-chan, what do you think of our huge bath?
Oh, it was very cramcozy and relaxing.
Raiha, we are taking a bath next.
I know how Nino feels now.
Onii-chan, can you bring the bedding out?
Let us all sleep together tonight.
What am I supposed to say?
There is something I have to talk to you about.
Let us go for a walk, shall we?
I do not want a lecture on class from someone who practically drank that curry.
I had not eaten in a day.
I cannot do that this time.
I cannot go home until Nino apologizes.
Of course, I cannot continue being a bother to your family, either.
You will leave, and then what?
You have neither your wallet nor anywhere to go.
P-Please let me stay a little longer!
I will do anything to help!
Besides, I do not think a well-to-do girl like you could survive in a place like mine.
We were living a similar lifestyle until just a few years ago.
Until our mother got remarried, to our current father,
She had to raise five children all at once.
Nothing would make me happier than for you five to live in good health.
And our mother, who raised us all on her own, fell ill.
That is why I decided to guide the others in my mother's stead.
But it has not worked out as well as I would planned.
So that must have been her doing what her mother would have.
You are trying to be a mother figure, huh?
I-I mean, what the hell is your father doing at a time like this?
Your dad should be stepping in here!
I will just accept that this is also part of my job as your tutor.
That day, when I met that girl in Kyoto,
I decided that someday, I would become a guy who was needed by someone.
The full moon sure is pretty tonight.
You still have a lot of studying to do.
Wh-What is that supposed to mean?
I felt like someone was here just now.
D-Do not scare me like that!
What happened to playing the father?!
Itsuki, I do not mind you going
Do not talk to me out in public!
People are going to think we are walking to school together.
I do not mind you going to school from my place,
but what are you going to do about your textbooks?
I bumped into Yotsuba yesterday and had her bring them to me.
Why did not you ask for your purse, too?
I had the same thought later, but Yotsuba seemed busy.
She was not at home yesterday either.
I wonder what she is up to.
You signed up to help the track team?!
Do you have any idea how dire things are?!
but they said they would not be able make it into the marathon without me.
There you go again, being nice to everyone.
Sorry for keeping it a secret.
But I am working on your problem set when I am at home.
Nakano-san, practice is about to resume.
I will do my best, okay?
We are not done talking here!
I am not bothered about what happened.
You can get back on good terms with the others.
Not to the hotel from yesterday!
What are you going to do about the exams?!
We ask that you leave if you are not a guest.
I will make sure you pass!
So what if I pass the exam?
What can I do to get them back together?
If I drowned here, would they get worried and get back on the same page?
Yikes, my thoughts are going down a dangerous road.
I have been doing it wrong.
Maybe I had the wrong idea, because they trusted me and were counting on me.
It was not my place to concern myself with another family's problems.
You should never have come into our lives!
It was all wrong from the beginning.
All I have been doing is studying.
There you go, getting bummed out again.
You have not changed, have you...
Sorry, I am in the middle of practice.
Please take care of Nino and Itsuki for me.
That is as far as you go.
How many times do we have to tell you?
We are never going to let you in!
He would better knock it off.
I need to tell him off.
How many times do I have to turn him away?
He does not know when to stop.
If the other guests see you walking around looking like a bum, they will think you are an eyesore.
